SEARCH
Package Cashier

Class Employee_Controller

java.lang.Object
Cashier.Employee_Controller
public class Employee_Controller extends Object
Employee admin screen - list/add/remove users. Simple FX table hookups. Talks to `Database.db` and refreshes UI on the FX thread.
Author:
Akil Daresalamwala

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Employee_Controller.EmployeeRowView
    Simple employee row model for the employees table (id, name, manager, remove).
